pageContext.claim: “As many of you testified today, the left-wing rioting and mayhem are the direct result of decades of left-wing indoctrination in our schools. It's gone on far too long. Our children are instructed from propaganda tracts, like those of Howard Zinn, that try to make students ashamed of their own history.”
pageContext.analysis: This is ridiculous. American students are not taught from propaganda tracts. The protests are not a result of "left-wing indoctrination" so much as racial injustice, police brutality, anti-Trump sentiments and some rioters.
